title: A Guide to the Nvidia Chips at the Center of US-China AI Rivalry
description: As China races to catch up with the US in artificial intelligence technology, the state of relations between the countries can be gauged by looking at which of the chips made by Silicon Valley’s Nvidia Corp. can be shipped to Chinese customers.
content:

title: South Korea to require advertisers to label AI

content: South Korea will require advertisers to label their ads made with artificial intelligence technologies from next year as it seeks to curb a surge of deceptive promotions featuring fabricated experts or deep-faked celebrities endorsing food or pharmac... [4359 chars]

title: Govt panel proposes blanket licence for AI firms to use copyrighted works; seeks public views
description: NEW DELHI, Dec 9 : Seeking public views, a government committee has proposed giving a mandatory blanket licence to artificial intelligence developers for using all legally accessed copyright-protected works to train AI systems. However, the licence should be accompanied by a statutory remuneration right for the copyright holders, according to the committee’s recommendation. These suggestions are part of a working paper prepared by the committee and released by the Department for Promotion of Industry and Internal Trade (DPIIT) seeking stakeholders’ […]
content:
NEW DELHI, Dec 9 : Seeking public views, a government committee has proposed giving a mandatory blanket licence to artificial intelligence developers for using all legally accessed copyright-protected works to train AI systems.

title: Pete Hegseth Chooses Google Gemini to Lead the First Front in the 'Future of American Warfare'
description: "We are pushing all of our chips in on artificial intelligence as a fighting force," Hegseth said.

title: Intel trims more South Bay jobs as chip maker seeks to steady the ship
description: Intel has decided to slash dozens of jobs in the South Bay as the chipmaking titan attempts to steady its operations in a quest to capitalize on the artificial intelligence surge that has reshaped the tech landscape.
content:
SANTA CLARA — Intel decided to slash dozens of jobs in the South Bay as the company moves to reduce its workforce while attempting to keep and acquire talented workers.
The tech company revealed it cut 59 jobs, all in Santa Clara, where the company h... [831 chars]

title: Shining a torch on Australia’s AI blind spots
description: Australian companies are pouring significant money into artificial intelligence, yet many remain unsure how to turn it into real strategic advantage.
content:

title: Howard Marks Says AI Is ‘Terrifying’ for Jobs
description: Artificial intelligence has created a “terrifying” outlook for employment, Oaktree Capital Management LP co-founder Howard Marks cautioned, and an assumed productivity boom fails to consider how many people will be able to afford the additional goods produced.

title: TikTok content creator accused of using AI to create videos that panicked strangers
description: A content creator has been accused of using artificial intelligence to produce fake social media videos of strangers in Florida.
content:
